items.title: Team Building Activity and New Year Celebration
items.description: The Zhang Lab held a team-building activity and New Year celebration, fostering camaraderie and celebrating the achievements of the past year, and looking forward to new opportunities in the coming year!

items.title: PhD Defense Celebration
items.description: We celebrate Liu Junyu's successful completion of his PhD defense.

items.title: Happy Teacher's Day
items.description: Happy Teacher's Day to our advisor Professor Zhang! We celebrate both Teacher's Day and your well-deserved 2024 Outstanding Teacher Award!

items.title: 2024 Outstanding Teacher/Employee Award
items.description: Congratulations to Professor ZHANG Canyang (PI), recipient of the 2024 Outstanding Teacher Award, and to ZHANG Xiaopeng (PhD.), recipient of the 2024 Outstanding Employee Award!

items.title: Welcome New Members
items.description: We warmly welcome four new members to our lab: MD Foridul Islam (PhD student), Zheng Zhongjun, Ji Peihan and Liu Jiangnan (graduate students).

items.title: Welcoming Dr. Li Anna
items.description: Welcoming Dr. Li Anna to our research group!

items.title: Graduation Celebration
items.description: Celebrating the successful graduation of master's students Liu Jiahui, Kou Fujia, and Li Dan!

items.title: Fourth Anniversary
items.description: Celebrating the Fourth Anniversary of Professor Zhang's Appointment at Tsinghua SIGS!

items.title: Chemical Management Recognition
items.description: Congratulations! Our lab has excelled in chemical management informatization efforts and has been recognized as an Outstanding Implementation Unit for Chemical Management Informatization. Xiaobin Li has been awarded the Excellence in Action Pioneer Award.

items.title: Welcome New Member
items.description: We get new member today! Welcome Juping Sun join us as research assistant.

items.title: Welcome New Members
items.description: We get new members today! Welcome Fan Zhang and Xueming Zheng join us as graduate students.

items.title: Welcome Exchange Student
items.description: We get new member today! Welcome Japanese exchange student Kanako YAMAMOTO to our research group.

items.title: Welcome New Members
items.description: We get new members today! Welcome Yumao HE and Zhe KANG join us as graduate students.

items.title: Joint Graduate Program Seminar
items.description: Professor Zhang and Xiaobin Li attended the Tokyo Institute of Technology â€“ Tsinghua University Joint Graduate Program 20th Anniversary Commemorative Joint Seminar and gave presentations.

items.title: Media Feature
items.description: The Professor Zhang was featured on the institute's official WeChat account.

items.title: Welcome New Member
items.description: We get new member today. Welcome Yuqi Zhang join us as research assistant.

items.title: Graduation Celebration
items.description: Congratulations! Wanwan Liu and Kexin Deng have successfully graduated with Master's degrees!

items.title: Postdoc Completion
items.description: Congratulations! Dr. Liang Zhao on successfully completing his postdoctoral research!

items.title: Thesis Defense & Assessment
items.description: Kexin Deng and Wanwan Liu successfully passed their master's thesis defense.

items.title: Thesis Defense & Assessment
items.description: Dr. Liang Zhao successfully passed the postdoctoral exit assessment.

items.title: Outstanding Concept Validation Award
items.description: Congratulations! The team project "Development and Application of Soluble Gas Bubble Microneedles in Medical Aesthetics," led by Xiaopeng Zhang, Fujia Kou, Yiting Li, and Yilin Zheng, received the Outstanding Concept Validation Award at the 2023 Tsinghua University Shenzhen International Graduate School.

items.title: Professional Practice Award
items.description: Congratulations! During the 2023-2024 academic year, Kexin Deng exhibited exceptional performance and achieved significant accomplishments in her professional practice. She was honored with "the Third Prize of the Ninth Professional Practice Award" by Tsinghua Shenzhen International Graduate School.

items.title: Team Building
items.description: The laboratory's first team-building event of 2024

items.title: Doctoral Defense
items.description: Xiaopeng Zhang successfully passed his doctoral dissertation defense.

items.title: Welcome New Members
items.description: We get new members today. Welcome Jian TANG and Han WU join us as graduate students.

items.title: Teacher's Day
items.description: Happy Teacher's Day!

items.title: Welcome New Members
items.description: We get new members today. Welcome Xiaotong ZHAO and Wanyue ZHANG and Yuqing HUANG join us as graduate students.

items.title: Welcome New Members
items.description: We get new members today. Welcome Lan QIN and Xupu XING and Fangyu ZHOU join us as research assistants.

items.title: Pearl River Talent Program
items.description: Congratulations to Prof. Can Yang ZHANG for being selected as a Pearl River Talent Program (Young Elite Talent) member!

items.title: Welcome New Member
items.description: Welcome Kexin Deng join our group as a graduate student!

items.title: New Semester
items.description: New semester begins. Happy new year.

items.title: Team Building
items.description: All members in the group joined in the team building activities including having meals together, watching a movie and playing the Werewolf game. Nice day!

items.title: Best Oral Presentation Award
items.description: Congratulations! Junyu Liu received the 'Best Oral Presentation Award' in the first Pharmaceutical Health Engineering Cup.

items.title: Welcome New Students
items.description: A new class of students has been enrolled. We welcome Dan Li, Fujia Kou and Jiahui Liu as graduate students, Yilin Zheng as PhD candidate come here, happy new semester!

items.title: Welcome Postdoc
items.description: Nice day! We get a new member today. Welcome Dr. Liang Zhao join us as a postdoctor.

items.title: Welcome Postdoc
items.description: First of all, happy new year! Welcome Dr. Xiaopeng Zhang as a postdoctor come with us.

items.title: Welcome New Students
items.description: A new class of graduate students has been enrolled. We welcome Junyu Liu and Wanwan Liu as members come here, happy new semester!
